El vanadio dispersa los impactos de las armas con más eficacia que las corazas tradicionales, y preserva mejor la vida de nuestras unidades.<n/><n/>Ahora cada mejora de armadura en la Armería y el Centro de ingeniería aumenta 5% la vida de las unidades además de aumentar la armadura.</s> /// <s val="ResearchDescSummary_Protoss">- Armor upgrades increase life by 5%.<n/>- Applies to Armory and Engineering Bay.</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Protoss">We have created a new lightweight alloy called vanadium. Vanadium diffuses weapon impacts much more effectively than traditional armor plating, and it better preserves the life of our units.<n/><n/>Now each of the armor upgrades in the Armory and Engineering Bay increases unit life by 5% in addition to increasing armor.</s>

Key pivot joints have been added to the Supply Depot's structure, allowing the Supply Depot to survive the violent turbulence of breaking through an atmosphere.<n/><n/>Now an SCV simply has to place a Beacon, and the crew on the Hyperion will handle the rest.</s>

UserData/GlobalPower/ResearchProtossT3A_Description=<s val="ResearchDescSummary_Protoss">- La Refinería ya no necesita VCE para recolectar gas vespeno.</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Protoss">Hemos adaptado la tecnología de transposición protoss para transportar contenedores de gas directo de la Refinería al Centro de mando. De esta forma, eliminamos la necesidad de que los transporten los VCE.<n/><n/>Se desconoce por qué a los protoss nunca se les ocurrió transportar el vespeno de esta forma. Quizá carecen de la creatividad y el pragmatismo de los terran, o tal vez sus supersticiones primitivas prohíben esa práctica.</s> /// <s val="ResearchDescSummary_Protoss">- Refinery no longer requires SCVs to harvest vespene gas.</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Protoss">We have adapted Protoss warp technology to transport gas canisters straight from the Refinery to the Command Center, eliminating the need for SCVs to carry them back.<n/><n/>Why the Protoss have never thought to transport vespene in this fashion is a mystery. Perhaps they lack Terran creativity and pragmatism, or possibly their primitive superstitions forbid the practice.</s>

Este material utiliza Nanobots para reparar lentamente todo daño que reciba el casco.<n/><n/>Si bien este proceso de regeneración es mucho más lento que las reparaciones convencionales con VCE, puede salvar vidas cuando no hay VCE disponibles.</s> /// <s val="ResearchDescSummary_Zerg">- Ships and vehicles slowly regenerate life.</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Zerg">Our ship and vehicle hulls are now made from a material called Regenerative Bio-Steel. This material uses internal Nanobots to slowly repair any damage the hull sustains.<n/><n/>While this regeneration process is much slower than conventional SCV repairs, it can be the difference between life and death if no SCVs are available.</s>
